turns.text: Where is your favorite place to go
turns.label: qw

turns.text: Well we havent traveled outside the United States that much Uh we usually take family type vacations Were looking forward to one in October to Disneyworld in Florida
turns.label: sd

turns.text: When when both of my kids were much younger And this time were going to be going with just one daughter and shes nine so it ought to just be ball
turns.label: na

turns.text: Oh thats great Yeah so weve been there number of times and uh were going next year We have business trip every fall Well we go on lot of business trips I
turns.label: ba

turns.text: Well we do We - - my husband travels couple times month and in the position hes in they dont care if I go along
turns.label: aa

turns.text: So its great I just kind of join up when its something interesting and --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- uh Disneyworld is the one for week next year --
-- and it will be at this time of the year and this year were leaving uh uh matter of fact were leaving next Saturday for New Orleans
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh that will be fun too
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Have have you ever been there
turns.label: qy

turns.text: Yes We went years ago We havent been lately and I know theyve changed it lot and upgraded everything but we used to have lot of fun there
turns.label: ny

turns.text: Well you know we went there once In fact we had been in Dallas and we were on our way home and we were driving and we said lets go to New Orleans So when he said well this year you know I have week there on project hes going to be - and then I said well Ill going along I hope its swimming season because it wasnt tremendous thing amount of things to do
turns.label: sd

turns.text: That I wanted to do there
Yeah if you dont like the night life and the antique shopping there isnt much there but that can be fun
turns.label: b

turns.text: It well and thats probably - we do like the night life to an extent and they do have Mardi Gras night planned
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And Im kind of anxious for that but uh yours to Disneyworld sounds little bit better Did you know that next week theres several shows coming from there in celebration of their anniversary
turns.label: sd

turns.text: No I know this is real good time to go because they are having so many activities and special shows
turns.label: nn

turns.text: Well and with daughter nine it is just - shes old enough to really grasp --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Be excited about all of it
turns.label: bf

turns.text: Uh so well if youre working then youre probably on limited amount of time per year that you can go
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Well not really were doing the same thing Tying it in with my husbands business trip and I just save vacation for things like that
turns.label: ar

turns.text: And uh just travel whenever we can
Well I really I think travel - when I heard my topic today I thought okay --
turns.label: sv

turns.text: -- thats my fav- thats my favorite - becau- -
And really at our point of life our children are grown and uh it has just worked out really well with this uh position hes in
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Because I can go at spur of the moment or what have you and it depends where hes going whether or not I decide to go along --
-- but I do do like to travel and its uh - I dont mind the pool life at all --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- during the day And I like to sight see and I love to shop
So thats perfect What more could you ask for
turns.label: bf

turns.text: And then got to pick and choose the places -
turns.label: bf

turns.text: Well and one of my very favorite is Las Vegas
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Uh that - I would have to say we both end up going to Las Vegas uh probably once every maybe year and half
And presently we have quite few frequent flyer miles --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- and so Ive just requested that they send us two of our coach tickets because we have lot of flying with Continental --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- and theyre recommending that you use those because they dont know the future of Continental
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And I said now that we have all the miles we better start using them
turns.label: sd(^q)

turns.text: So we are thinking that we might go to Las Vegas during the winter this year sometime for just kind of quick trip Uh when we normally go that way we like to go to California at the same time because we really dont get out there as often as you could probably --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Our last big trip we drove through New Mexico and Colorado and went to the Grand Canyon and and uh back through Silverton and Durango and oh it was fun It was so relaxing and really neat part of the country and the kids were old enough to really enjoy it Our -
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And really for the children to learn as well for family vacation that would be excellent
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Now we did what we sometimes do since we are in Ohio and it takes while just to even get to the what I would call the more picturesque part of the country we will fly to something like - once we flew to Colorado to Denver and then we rented car for two weeks and we went through the northern route and through Utah --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- and as far west as Las Vegas and then we returned through uh New Mexico that you just mentioned
Oh I I think thats thats the way to -
